text.name: Courier Trunk - Decay Knife
text.desc: [WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count: this Skill does not consume target's [Burst] Count On Hit, but does not inflict [Burst] with this Skill's On Hit effects
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Gain 1 [DevyatDimensionalSack]
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 [Burst]

text.name: Courier Trunk - Decay Knife
text.desc:
<style="highlight">At 10+ [DevyatDimensionalSack], or if target has 6+ [Burst], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count: this Skill does not consume target's [Burst] Count On Hit, but does not inflict [Burst] with this Skill's On Hit effects
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Gain 1 [DevyatDimensionalSack]
<style="highlight">- If this unit has less than 15 [DevyatDimensionalSack], gain 1 additional [DevyatDimensionalSack]
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 [Burst]<style="highlight">

text.name: Courier Trunk - Decay Knife

coinDescs:

text.name: I Trust Ya, Polu!
text.desc:
Deal +2% damage for every [DevyatDimensionalSack] (max 40%)
At 10+ [DevyatDimensionalSack] on self, or if target has 6+ [Burst], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count, this Skill does not inflict [Burst] Count with its On Hit effects; instead, Reuse its last Coin
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +3 [Burst] Count (once per turn)
[OnSucceedAttack] At 15+ [DevyatDimensionalSack], deal +15% damage
[EndSkill] If target is Staggered or defeated, gain 1 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)

text.name: I Trust Ya, Polu!
text.desc:

<style="highlight">Coin Power +1 for every 10 [DevyatDimensionalSack] on self or for every 6 [Burst] on target (max 2)

[EndSkill] If target is Staggered or defeated, gain <style="highlight">2 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)

text.name: Courier Support & Control Sequence
text.desc:
[StartBattle] At 15+ [DevyatDimensionalSack], activate 'Just... a Strategic Time Off!' instead (once per turn)
[StartBattle] If this Skill is to be activated, gain ([DevyatDimensionalSack]/2)% of this unit's max HP as Shield (max 15%, once per turn)
[WhenUse] Gain 2 [DevyatDimensionalSack] (once per turn)
- At less than 15 [DevyatDimensionalSack], gain 1 additional [DevyatDimensionalSack]

text.name: Courier Support & Control Sequence

text.name: Just... a Strategic Time Off!
text.desc:
[StartBattle] If this Skill is to be activated, gain <style="highlight">([DevyatDimensionalSack])% of this unit's max HP as Shield (max <style="highlight">25%, once per turn)
[EndBattle] Activate [Retreat]

1091001.name: Speedy Delivery
1091001.desc:
Turn Start: At 6+ Speed, or if this unit has [Agility], gain ([DevyatDimensionalSack]/2)% of this unit's max HP as Shield (max 15%)

Upon Retreat, apply 1 [ParryingResultUp] to 2 allies next turn (prioritizes Substituted units first, then in Deployment order)

1091002.name: Lemme go and I swear I'll make it in time!
1091002.desc: <For Chain Battles> When, after Retreating with '[Retreat]', if this unit rejoins the battle, halve the [DevyatDimensionalSack] value (once per Encounter, rounded up)

1091011.name: Speedy Delivery
1091011.desc:
Turn Start: At 6+ Speed, or if this unit has [Agility], gain <style="highlight">([DevyatDimensionalSack])%</style> of this unit's max HP as Shield (max <style="highlight">20%</style>)

Upon Retreat, apply 1 [ParryingResultUp] to 2 allies next turn (prioritizes Substituted units first, then in Deployment order)
<style="highlight">- Lasts for 1 additional turn for every 15 [DevyatDimensionalSack] on self (2 more turns max)</style>

1091021.name: Outstanding Courier
1091021.desc: To 1 ally with the fastest Speed: Clash Power +1 to Skills that apply [Burst] Potency or Count
